preqs: MGF2111 or MGC2230 or MGB2230 or MGG2230 or MGW2230

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGC1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGF2621, MGF3621, MGG3130, MGW2130}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGB2230, MGC2230, MGF2111, MGG2230, MGW2230} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGF2621, MGF3621, MGG3130, MGW2130}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-4, 10, 41, 50}

description: This unit examines the process of organisation change within the theoretical frameworks of organisation culture, power and leadership. It examines the major schools of thought concerning the management of change, and analyses change processes used in organisations.
